game.name: DCS: Marianas
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: We now offer the DCS: Marianas for FREE. For this new map, we have used our latest map technologies and provide a vastly different combat environment in a new part of the world.
